entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:17 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 08:17 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
